scripts.export: cd ./next && npx next build && move out ..
scripts.app:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file template.yml --stack-name OwpAppStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.dynamo:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file dynamo-auth.yml --stack-name DynamoAuthStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && npm run export && npm run upload && npm run deploy
scripts.handlers:updateSpecific: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name TestFunction --s3-bucket owp-aws-deploy-bucket --s3-key handlers.zip && aws lambda update-function-configuration --function-name TestFunction --layers arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:491085397542:layer:AuthLayer:2
scripts.auth:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file api-auth.yml --stack-name ApiAuthStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
